name: Discovery in the Temple
description: A group of explorers find an ancient relic in the depths of the Ancient Temple.

name: Bringing the Relic to the King
description: The explorers bring the relic to King Sharkon at the Royal Palace.

name: The Royal Court Debates
description: King Sharkon and his advisors debate the implications of the relic.

name: Marlin's Warning
description: Marlin warns King Sharkon and the Royal Court about the dangers associated with the relic.
